channel.title: Problem with Clan chat
channel.description:
Hey guys, need a little help fixing this:
1. I click 'Join chat' 2. I type the desired chat name and press enter. 3. Nothing happens.
Why does this happen and where can I fix it? Here is the link to my advertisement page, come see for yourself if you want please :S http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?server=hyperioum.no-ip.org
